nodes.bodyText: It could be an else of the previous if statement, otherwise, for consistency if(!val) could be used.
For consistency also, to ensure that this.values exists this could be if (!this.valuesInObservable && !! this.values)
For style consistency, it could be if(!!businessconfig)
A forEach on scripts could be make code shorter and simpler to read.
endDate.value === ''same as above, it could be !endDate.value
as startDate.value === ''in Javascript returns false in a boolean test this could be !startDate.value
To fit consistency, maybe this could be if(!!val).
